Plot: A misfit ant, looking for "warriors" to save his colony from greedy grasshoppers, recruits a group of bugs that turn out to be an inept circus troupe.
Title: A Bug's Life
Writer: John Lasseter (original story by), Andrew Stanton (original story by), Joe Ranft (original story by), Andrew Stanton (screenplay), Don McEnery (screenplay), Bob Shaw (screenplay)
Actors: Dave Foley, Kevin Spacey, Julia Louis-Dreyfus, Hayden Panettiere
tomatoConsensus: A Bug's Life is a rousing adventure that blends animated thrills with witty dialogue and memorable characters - and another smashing early success for Pixar.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 14 wins & 19 nominations.
